title: Histology Feature Extraction Pipeline Parameters
description: Parameters for the Histology Feature Extraction pipeline using TRIDENT

input_output_options.title: Input/Output Options
input_output_options.description: Define the input data and output locations

dataset.description: Path to CSV file containing list of WSIs to process. Format: case_id,wsi
dataset.help_text: CSV file with columns: case_id, wsi. Example: TCGA-3C-AAAU,TCGA-3C-AAAU-01A-01-TS1.2F52DD63-7476-4E85-B7C6-E06092DB6CC1.svs

wsi_dir.description: Directory containing whole slide image (WSI) files
wsi_dir.help_text: Path to directory where WSI files are stored. Must be accessible from the execution environment.

outdir.help_text: Directory where all pipeline outputs will be saved. Results include segmentation, coordinates, patch features, and slide features.
